source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_00<tab>Raya<var 1F /var>O would call a meeting to discuss measures against the taint.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_00<tab>キャンプ・トランキルのラヤ・オ・センナは、「死霊の肉片」の調査を終えたようだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_01<tab>Raya<var 1F /var>O informs you that she and A<var 1F /var>Ruhn have conceived a plan to deal with the taint. Go and fetch Eschiva from Fallgourd Float, that they might share the particulars with everyone.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_01<tab>ラヤ・オ・センナは「不浄なるもの」への対抗手段を考えついたという。北部森林のフォールゴウドで「エシヴァ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_02<tab>Eschiva is surprised that the Seedseers still wish to see her in spite of her earlier display. Deciding that she may have been too quick to judge them, she agrees to come with you to Camp Tranquil.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_02<tab>エシヴァもアラカのことを見逃せないと、呼び出しに応じてくれた。キャンプ・トランキルで「ラヤ・オ・センナ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_03<tab>Much to Eschiva's relief, her words have reached Raya<var 1F /var>O and A<var 1F /var>Ruhn; the two Seedseers have resolved to leave the Twelveswood in order to help you purge the taint. With their heightened sensitivity to aether, they believe they can ascertain the site of Alaqa's experiment. Make your way to the Dravanian forelands, where you last saw Alaqa, and join Eschiva and the Seedseers at Tailfeather.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_03<tab>ラヤ・オ・センナとア・ルン・センナは、浄化のため黒衣森を離れるという。高地ドラヴァニアのテイルフェザーで「エシヴァ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_04<tab>Shortly after arriving at Tailfeather, A<var 1F /var>Ruhn senses an anomaly in the aether emanating from the northwest. A cavern called Mourn lies in that direction, along with a water vein, and the party decides to investigate it. Brave the dragon-infested area and search for Alaqa.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_04<tab>ア・ルン・センナは北西の方角からエーテルのゆらぎを感じるという。高地ドラヴァニアのモーン大岩窟で「アラカ」を探そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_05<tab>Deep within the cavern of Mourn, you find Alaqa just as she completes her experiment─an undead dragon whose existence is sustained by the taint. Upon confronting her, the Au Ra justifies her actions as self-preservation: her tribesmen have suffered much at the hands of the ignorant, and she desires but to protect them. Having said her piece, she unleashes her pet upon you, but you succeed in overcoming it and purifying the taint which gave it life. With her dreams of vengeance thus shattered, all of the fight goes out of Alaqa.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_05<tab>「不浄なるもの」の根源である<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2105901 /var>を倒した。モーン大岩窟の「ラヤ・オ・センナ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_06<tab>Though Alaqa must answer for her crimes, Raya<var 1F /var>O offers her words of hope for the future. Watching on from a distance, A<var 1F /var>Ruhn resolves to do as A<var 1F /var>Towa<var 1F /var>Cant once did and go wheresoever his powers are needed, be it to the ends of the world. With gratitude, he accepts Eschiva's offer to accompany him as he embarks upon his journeys.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_06<tab>ラヤ・オ・センナは、アラカが未来に向けて生きることを願い言葉を届けた。エシヴァも、ア・ルン・センナと共に黒衣森の脅威に立ち向かうことを決めたようだ。モーン大岩窟の「ラヤ・オ・センナ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_07<tab>The two Seedseers shall see the misguided Au Ra given over to the Wood Wailers. Afterwards, Raya<var 1F /var>O bids you and Eschiva come to see her and A<var 1F /var>Ruhn at Camp Tranquil, that they might properly thank you for your services to the Twelveswood.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_07<tab>ラヤ・オ・センナは、アラカを牢へ送った後に礼を言いたいという。キャンプ・トランキルの「ラヤ・オ・センナ」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_08<tab>You bid Eschiva farewell as she departs with A<var 1F /var>Ruhn. Together with her siblings, Raya<var 1F /var>O vows to continue preserving the harmony of the forest, protecting it from threats both within and without. With your newfound powers, go forth and shine the light of succor and solace across all the realm.

※The next white mage quest will be available from Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna once you completed the main scenario quest “The Far Edge of Fate.”
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_08<tab>冒険者を待っていたエシヴァは、礼を言うと去っていった。ラヤ・オ・センナとア・ルン・センナは、今後は、森の内と外の両方から、黒衣森の調和のために働いていくことを決意するのだった。

※以下の条件を満たすと、キャンプ・トランキルのラヤ・オ・センナから、新たなジョブクエストを受注することができます。
1.「メインクエスト：竜詩戦争 戦後編」の、
　「宿命の果て」を完了する。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_09<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SEQ_09<tab>

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Eschiva at Fallgourd Float.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_00<tab>フォールゴウドのエシヴァと話す

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_01<tab>ラヤ・オ・センナと話す

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Eschiva at Tailfeather.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_02<tab>テイルフェザーでエシヴァと合流

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_03<tab>Search for Alaqa in Mourn.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_03<tab>モーン大岩窟でアラカを探す

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna in Mourn.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_04<tab>モーン大岩窟のラヤ・オ・センナと話す

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_05<tab>再度モーン大岩窟のラヤ・オ・センナと話す

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna at Camp Tranquil.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_TODO_06<tab>キャンプ・トランキルのラヤ・オ・センナと話す

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We have conceived a plan to deal with the taint!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、いいところに来たわね。
「不浄なるもの」への対抗手段を考えついたわ……！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_001<tab>We would share the particulars with everyone; might I trouble you to fetch Eschiva?
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_001<tab>詳しいことを話すから……
エシヴァにも、このことを伝えてくれないかしら。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_002<tab>She will have returned to Fallgourd Float, I believe.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_002<tab>私もア・ルンを呼んでおくから、
彼女に伝えたら、ここに戻ってきてちょうだい。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_003<tab>Pray return here after you have notified her. A<var 1F /var>Ruhn and I shall be waiting.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_003<tab>エシヴァは、多分「フォールゴウド」に戻っていると思う。
……来てくれるかわからないけど、よろしくね。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_004<tab>We have conceived a plan to deal with the taint. Pray fetch Eschiva from Fallgourd Float, that we might share the particulars with everyone.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_004<tab>エシヴァは、多分「フォールゴウド」に戻っていると思う。
私もア・ルンを呼んでおくから、
エシヴァに伝えたら、ここに戻ってきてちょうだい。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_010<tab>Oh, it's you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I must apologize for my earlier display.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_010<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん……。
この間は取り乱してしまいすいませんでした。
どうかなさったのですか……？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_011<tab>The Seedseers wish to see me despite the disrespect I showed them? Though their ways baffle me, it cannot be denied that they care for the forest. Perhaps they deserve more credit than I give them.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_011<tab>……角尊が、私を呼んでいるのですか？
もう、私に会う気はないかと思っていました……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_012<tab>I will go, of course. Let us strike out at once.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_012<tab>アラカさんの暴挙は、放ってはおけませんものね……。
……ええ、「キャンプ・トランキル」へ向かいましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_015<tab>We each of us must do our part to protect the forest.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_015<tab>僕だって、やってみせる……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_016<tab>Worry not─I shall keep my tongue in check.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_016<tab>…………今は、話を伺いましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_020<tab>Our thanks for coming. Without further ado, let us begin.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_020<tab>よく来てくれたわね、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
そして……エシヴァ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_021<tab>After our last meeting, I went to the Guardian Tree and presented the tainted flesh to the great one.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_021<tab>長老の木に宿る大精霊が、死霊の肉片に反応したよ。
黒衣森を蝕みつつある「不浄なるもの」と、
同質の穢れたエーテルを帯びているということだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_023<tab>His reaction was telling─the befouled aether it bears is identical to the taint which now threatens the Twelveswood. Unless we stop Alaqa, the forest will be reduced to a wasteland of death.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_023<tab>この状況を放置すれば、アラカの言葉どおり、
いずれ、死霊が闊歩する死の世界が広まるだろうね……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_024<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> gave me to understand that you have conceived a plan to deal with the taint. What is this plan?
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_024<tab>……事態は一刻を争うということですか。
それで、「不浄なるもの」への対抗手段とは？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_025<tab>Simply put, A<var 1F /var>Ruhn and I shall accompany you to the Dravanian forelands.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_025<tab>あたしとア・ルンが、黒衣森を出て、
直接、高地ドラヴァニアに向かうことよ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_026<tab>As you are doubtless aware, we Padjals are chosen by the elementals to convey their will. Should that will go unheard or be misinterpreted, harmony would be lost and tragedy inevitably befall.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_026<tab>私たち角尊が、黒衣森に留まることを求められているのは、
精霊の声を、いつでも人々に伝えられるようにするため。
森と人の架け橋となり、悲劇を防ぐためにね。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_027<tab>In order to prevent this, we strive to hone our sensitivity to the elementals far beyond the limits of ordinary men. And this sensitivity allows us to perceive even the slightest fluctuations in the aether.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_027<tab>つまり、純粋なエーテル体ともいえる精霊との対話のため、
常に修行をつづけ、感覚を研ぎ澄ませているということ……。
私たちなら、微かなエーテルのゆらぎも捉えられるわ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_028<tab>With our faculty for sensing aether, A<var 1F /var>Ruhn and I shall ascertain the site of Alaqa's experiment. And once we find it, we will join our powers to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s and purge the taint once and for all!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_028<tab>私たちふたりの力で、アラカの「実験場」を突き止める。
そして、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>を含めた3人で、
力を合わせて浄化を行い、アラカを捕らえるの！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_029<tab>You would leave the forest? But what of the will of the elementals?
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_029<tab>しかし、森の掟はどうなさるのです……？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_030<tab>Rest assured we have obtained the Elder Seedseer's permission. Our sister shall see to it that the elementals do not go unheard during our absence.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_030<tab>カヌ・エ姉さまの許可は得てきたよ。
僕たちがいない間、森に何か起きてもいいように、
対策を打ってくださることになった。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_031<tab>But above all, your words struck home. We will not leave the two of you to bear the burden alone. We shall do all we can to aid you, as Padjals and white mages both.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_031<tab>何より、君の言葉が効いたよ……。
これ以上、君たちだけに重責をかけることはしない。
……角尊として、白魔道士として、協力させてほしいんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_033<tab>You truly mean to leave the forest and help us?
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_033<tab>森を出るという、その決意を……
信じていいんですね……？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_034<tab>In the heat of the moment, I forgot myself and spoke out of turn. I pray you can forgive me.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_034<tab>……先の非礼を詫びさせてください。
感情が高ぶって、敬意を欠いた発言をしてしまいました。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_035<tab>There is naught to forgive. On the contrary, we are grateful to you for opening our eyes. Now, I trust we can rely upon you to guide the way?
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_035<tab>いいのよ、お陰で目が覚めたんだから……。
でも、森を離れるのは初めてで、勝手がわからないの。
エシヴァには、案内役をお願いしてもいいかしら？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_037<tab>Listen, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. This will be our first time outside the forest, and we will most certainly make fools of ourselves. I would thank you not to enjoy yourself overmuch!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_037<tab>笑わないでよね、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
冒険者であるあなたと違って、旅には慣れてないんだから。
……さあ、行くわよ！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_038<tab>I shall escort the Seedseers to Tailfeather. Pray meet us there.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_038<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん……。
私は角尊のおふたりとともに向かいます。
「テイルフェザー」で落ち合うことにしましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_040<tab>With our powers combined, there is no taint that we cannot purge. Let us make for the Dravanian forelands at once!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_040<tab>私たちが3人揃えば、どんなものだって浄化可能よ。
さあ、高地ドラヴァニアに向かいましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_042<tab>Pray leave the escorting of the Seedseers to me. I shall see you at Tailfeather.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_042<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さん……。
私は角尊のおふたりとともに向かいます。
「テイルフェザー」で落ち合うことにしましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_043<tab>I-I am doing just fine, thank you for asking! There is nothing to it!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_043<tab>ふ、ふん……！　あたしは大丈夫……。
あんたこそ、シッカリするのよ！
ちゃんと、あたしを守ってよね……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_044<tab>That everything should be so different...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_044<tab>黒衣森の外……全然違うんだね……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_050<tab>So here we are at Tailfeather. Why, the journey here wasn't nearly as daunting as I expected. I daresay we could have made it without Eschiva!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_050<tab>どうにか、ここまでは来れたわね……。
いざ、こうして出てみれば、なんてことないじゃない！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_051<tab>Bold words coming from someone who fairly hugged our guide during the entire journey.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_051<tab>……姉さま、ここに着くまで、
ずっとエシヴァの後ろにくっついてたくせに。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_052<tab>Ahem! S-Seeing as we are here, we ought to get to work! Do you sense anything, Brother?
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_052<tab>そ、そんなことより！
ア・ルンは、何か感じないの！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_053<tab>I do─an anomaly in the aether that wrenches the stomach... It emanates from the north and west.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_053<tab>ムカムカするような、嫌なエーテルのゆらぎを感じるよ……。
多分、北西の方角から……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_054<tab>A cavern lies in that direction─Mourn, 'tis called. And if memory serves, so too does a water vein. It seems to me that is where we must go.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_054<tab>北西の方角というと「モーン大岩窟」ですね。
確かに、あの近辺にも地下水脈が通っているようです。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_055<tab>I must warn you all, though, that the area is thick with dragons. We must proceed with caution.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_055<tab>ドラゴン族の住む土地ですから、
より一層の注意が必要になりますね……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_056<tab>D-Dragons, you say? Well, I for one would welcome the excitement! The journey thus far has been rather dull for my tastes!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_056<tab>ふ、ふん、そんなの望むところよ！
ドラゴン族だろうがアラカだろうが、
みんなまとめて、ぶっ飛ばしてやろうじゃないの！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_057<tab>Dull suits us just fine, Sister. Remember, our priority is to purge the taint.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_057<tab>ええっ！　別にぶっ飛ばさなくていいんじゃない？
「不浄なるもの」さえ浄化できればいいんだから……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_058<tab>As if I would forget! The fate of the Twelveswood is at stake! Let us make haste to Mourn and confront Alaqa!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_058<tab>向こうが襲ってくるかもしれないでしょうが！
いいから「モーン大岩窟」に行くわよ！
黒衣森を死の世界にしてたまるもんですか！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_061<tab>The cavern of Mourn lies to the north and west. The area is home to dragons, so let us proceed with caution.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_061<tab>北西の方角というと「モーン大岩窟」ですね。
ドラゴン族の住む土地ですから、
より一層の注意が必要になります……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_070<tab>So, you are still alive.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_070<tab>あなた、生きていたのね……。
あのとき、死んじゃえばよかったのに……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_071<tab>Most intriguing─horns such as I have, yet you are not Au Ra... Well, whatever you are, you are no different from the others. You have come to interfere with my experiment. But know this: it is your ignorance that has led us down this path.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_071<tab>そっちのふたりも角が生えてるけど……同族じゃなさそうね。
みんな、私を捕らえるために来たのね……。
どうして……どうして私は拒絶されるの？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_072<tab>We Xaela are nomads who roam and live off the land. My tribe was no different. Yet though we did no harm to those whose lands we traversed, they treated us as vermin. In their ignorance, they feared us, and that fear manifested as spite and violence.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_072<tab>私たち、アウラ・ゼラは、故郷を持たぬ流浪の民……。
いろいろな土地を巡っては、あらゆる迫害を受けてきたわ……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_073<tab>My loved ones and I were cursed at, spat upon, beaten, and worse. It was out of the desire to protect them that I began my research. Such pain we have suffered, I swore that I would visit upon the ignorant masses a hundredfold!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_073<tab>とっても辛かった……だから、たくさん研究したの……。
居場所を作るため、身を守るため、
迫害に対抗する力を求めて……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_074<tab>And soon I shall fulfill my goal, for my experiment has finally borne fruit!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_074<tab>かわいいでしょう……？
実験の果てに遂に完成させた、私の最高傑作……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_075<tab>To be sure, there is still work to be done; such robust flesh cannot be sustained by ordinary aether. Nay, it must needs be fed something far more potent─the taint.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_075<tab>でもね、ドラゴン族の強靭な身体に見合う生命力を、
肉体にあたえることができなくて……。
「不浄なるもの」に満たされた土地でしか活動できないの。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_076<tab>My pet can go only where the taint exists, and so I shall fill the whole world with it!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_076<tab>この世が「不浄なるもの」で満たされれば……
そうなれば、この子も外へと旅に出られる。
私を迫害した連中を見返すことができる……！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_077<tab>S-Sister! I sense naught but befouled aether from that dragon!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_077<tab>姉さま……。
あのドラゴンゾンビから、強い穢れたエーテルを感じる！
あれが、「不浄なるもの」の根源に違いないよ！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_078<tab>This is without a doubt the source of the taint. We must needs purify it whole!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_078<tab>ええ、あいつは莫大な「不浄なるもの」を、
体内に溜め込んでいるみたいね……。
……ぶちのめして、徹底的に「浄化」するわよ！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_081<tab>You would get in the way of my vengeance? Then you shall be the first to feel my wrath!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_081<tab>あなたたちに理解してもらおうなんて思ってない……。
私の復讐は、誰にも邪魔はさせないわ……。
この子の力を見せてあげる！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_122<tab>We all of us can accomplish far more than we dare imagine.
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_122<tab>僕も、角尊として……やればできるんだ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_123<tab>With the taint eliminated at the source, the Twelveswood is safe again.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_123<tab>「不浄なるもの」の根源は絶ちました。
これで、黒衣森も大丈夫ですね……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_100_124<tab>No...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_100_124<tab>……………………そんな。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_100<tab>My dreams... All gone to dust...
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_100<tab>私の……最高傑作が……。
壊されちゃった……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_101<tab>I am powerless─powerless to protect my people, powerless to change anything...
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_101<tab>これで、もう私には何もない……。
ずっと迫害されてきて、最後はひとり牢の中で朽ちる……。
……嫌われ者にふさわしい末路ね。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_102<tab>We are cowards, all of us. That which we do not understand instills fear within us, and so we lash out. In return, you sought to strike back at those who hurt you.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_102<tab>私たちは、とっても臆病……。
だから、自分と違うものを恐れて……傷つけてしまう。
そしてあなたも、自分を拒否する者を恐れ、傷つけようとした。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_104<tab>You have done terrible things, and must be held to account for your crimes.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_104<tab>あなたの犯した罪は大きいけれど、それでもつぐなえるわ。
「不浄なるもの」だって浄化できたように……ね。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_105<tab>But know that it is not too late to make amends. You still have a chance to atone.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_105<tab>だから、牢で朽ちるなんてもったいないと思うの……。
それより、罪をつぐなったらどうしたいか、考えてみない？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_106<tab>Your knowledge may yet be used for good. You need but find a new purpose, and I should be glad to help you look for it.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_106<tab>外の世界に出て、何をしてみたいか……。
私も、たまにお話に行くから、一緒に考えましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_107<tab>With Alaqa apprehended, it seems safe to say that danger to the Twelveswood is past. And we owe it all to the two of you.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_107<tab>「不浄なるもの」の根源を作りだしていた彼女を、
捕らえたからには、黒衣森の危機も去ったことになる。
すべては、君たちのおかげだ……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_108<tab>This experience has taught me much and more, not least of all how powerless I was in the face of an external threat.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_108<tab>森の外からやってくる脅威に対して、
自分が、どれだけ無力かを思い知らされたよ……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_109<tab>If I am to protect the forest, I must needs spend less time with my head in the treetops and more with my feet on the ground. To that end, I shall strive to be a Padjal as Master A<var 1F /var>Towa was, standing ready to journey to the ends of the world if needs be.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_109<tab>……だから、僕も変わろうと思うんだ。
また、森に不浄の影が忍び寄ったとき、ア・トワ様のように、
外の世界へと旅立つ、そんな旅の角尊になってみせる。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_110<tab>Were it not for your shining example, I never would have found the courage to come to this decision. I cannot thank you enough.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_110<tab>僕がこうして決断できたのは……
エシヴァと、君のおかげだ。
黒衣森のために、尽力してくれてありがとう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_111<tab>Master A<var 1F /var>Ruhn. When the time comes for you to embark upon your journey, pray allow me to accompany you.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_111<tab>……ア・ルン様。
ならば、その時は、私を旅のお供としてお連れください！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_112<tab>It isn't safe to travel alone, you know this to be true. Besides, you need someone to keep a record of all your deeds, that they might be passed on to future generations.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_112<tab>おひとりで旅をなさるなど、無謀が過ぎます！
それに、記録する同行者がいなければ、
旅の意義を、後世に伝えられないではありませんか。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_113<tab>For all my bold words, I am still but a green sapling. Nevertheless, I would serve you faithfully as my grandfather once served Master A<var 1F /var>Towa.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_113<tab>未熟者ではありますが……
どうか、私の祖父が、ア・トワ様に付き従ったように、
あなたを、支えさせてください……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_114<tab>I should be heartened to have your company, Eschiva. I shall endeavor to be a Padjal worthy of your respect.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_114<tab>……ありがとう、僕たちのことを受け入れてくれて。
君が、心から信望できるような角尊になってみせるよ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_115<tab>Thank you, Master A<var 1F /var>Ruhn! I swear you'll not be disappointed in me!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_115<tab>私も、あなたをお守りする責務をまっとうできるよう、
全力をもって、お仕えいたします。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_121<tab>A new purpose...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_000_121<tab>私と話そうとしてくれる人なんて、今までいなかった……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_120<tab>A<var 1F /var>Ruhn and I shall escort Alaqa and place her in the Wood Wailers' care. Pray come and see us afterwards at Camp Tranquil─we would thank you properly.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_120<tab>ここを出たら、あたしたちはアラカを牢へ連れていくわ。
あんたは、あとで「キャンプ・トランキル」へ来て。
ちゃんとお礼を言わなくちゃね。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_125<tab>A<var 1F /var>Ruhn and I shall escort Alaqa and place her in the Wood Wailers' care. Pray come and see us afterwards at Camp Tranquil─we would thank you properly.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_125<tab>ここを出たら、あたしたちはアラカを牢へ連れていくわ。
あんたは、あとで「キャンプ・トランキル」へ来て。
ちゃんとお礼を言わなくちゃね。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_126<tab>You have given me the courage to make a change. I cannot thank you enough.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_000_126<tab>君たちには、どれだけ感謝しても足りないよ。
僕に勇気をくれてありがとう……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_127<tab>I shall soon depart with Master A<var 1F /var>Ruhn. I'm glad for this opportunity to see you again.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_127<tab>ア・ルン様と、今後の相談をこれからするんです。
でも、その前に、あなたに会っておきたくて……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_130<tab>During the entire way back, Alaqa did not so much as favor us with a glance, but neither did she attempt to flee.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_130<tab>おかえりなさい、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
アラカは、最後までこちらを見てはくれなかったけど……。
でも、逃げるようなことはなかったわ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_131<tab>I believe there is hope for her yet. Till such time as she finds a new purpose, I shall visit her cell as often as my duties allow.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_131<tab>彼女が、この広い世界でやりたいことを見つけられるまで、
あたしは牢に通いつづけるつもりよ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_132<tab>With the source of the taint banished, the great one's warnings have ceased. We may rest easy for a time.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_132<tab>元凶を断ったことで、大精霊も落ち着きを取り戻したわ。
しばらくは、「不浄なるもの」を心配する必要はなさそう。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_133<tab>Disaster has been averted thanks to you and Eschiva. We are eternally in your debt.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_133<tab>これも、あんたとエシヴァのおかげね……。
本当にありがとう……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_134<tab>You are kind for saying so, my lady, but I have done scarcely anything. All your gratitude should be reserved for <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_134<tab>……いえ、私はほとんど何もしていません。
すべては、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>さんの功績です。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_135<tab>Allow me to thank you as well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Had you not sought me out that day, I may never have found my true calling.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_135<tab>私からもお礼を言わせてください。
あなたは、私の心の中で固まりきっていた考えを打ち砕いて、
私の世界を広げてくださいました。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_136<tab>Beginning today, I shall accompany Master A<var 1F /var>Ruhn as he works to maintain peace and harmony within the Twelveswood.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_136<tab>これからは、ア・ルン様に付き従いながら、
森を襲う脅威に立ち向かっていこうと思います。
ア・トワ様と祖父がそうしたように……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_137<tab>I know not where our journeys will take us, but when next we meet, I shall stand before you a stronger woman!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_000_137<tab>いずれ、旅の中でお会いする日もあるかもしれません。
その時は、今よりもたくましくなった姿を見せられるように、
私、がんばります！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_100_137<tab>We had best be on our way. Fare you well on your own journeys, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I look forward to seeing you again, within the Twelveswood <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> without!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_100_137<tab>それじゃあ、僕らは失礼するよ。
黒衣森の外で、君に会える日を楽しみにしておくね！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_138<tab>Well, they pretty much exhausted everything I had intended to say...
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_138<tab>……まったく。
あたしの言いたいことを、ほとんど言ってくれちゃったわね。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_139<tab>So I shall say but this: I mean to do my part as well. Together with my siblings, I shall work to preserve the harmony of the forest, protecting it from threats both within and without.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_139<tab>あたしも、ア・ルンとお互いに協力しつつ、
森の内と外の両方から、
黒衣森の調和のために働くつもりよ。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_140<tab>As for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> of the white─with your newfound powers, pray continue employing our art for the betterment of the realm!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_140<tab>だから……白魔道士<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
あなたは、この浄化の旅で得た癒しの力を使い、
今後も、世界のために旅をつづけなさい！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_141<tab>May the light of succor and solace shine wheresoever you may go!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_141<tab>……なんてね。
改めて言われなくてもわかってるだろうけど。
これからもよろしくね、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>This concludes the white mage quests for FINAL FANTASY XIV: Heavensward. In order to undertake the next series of quests, you must first meet the following requirements:
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SYSTEM_000_500<tab>「白魔道士」の物語が、ひとつの区切りを迎えました！
次の「白魔道士」のジョブクエストを開始するためには、
以下の条件を満たす必要があります。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SYSTEM_000_501<tab>※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “The Far Edge of Fate.”
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SYSTEM_000_501<tab>1.「メインクエスト：竜詩戦争 戦後編」の、
　「宿命の果て」を完了する。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SYSTEM_000_502<tab>Once you have done so, the next white mage quest will be available from Raya<var 1F /var>O<var 1F /var>Senna.
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_SYSTEM_000_502<tab>条件を満たし、キャンプ・トランキルの、
「ラヤ・オ・センナ」に話しかけ、
新たなジョブクエストを開始しましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>Defeat the zombie dragon!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_QIB_001_TODO_1<tab>ドラゴンゾンビを倒せ！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>Heal the stagnant aether to defeat the zombie dragon!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_QIB_001_TODO_2<tab>スタグナントエーテルを癒してドラゴンゾンビを倒せ！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_00<tab>Kill them all, my lovely!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_00<tab>かわいい、かわいい<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2105901 /var>……。
あいつらを殺しちゃえ……！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_01<tab>It ends here, Alaqa!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_01<tab>あなたの思いどおりにはさせません！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_02<tab>You'll not harm so much as another leaf!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_02<tab>自然や他者を傷つけようだなんて、許しちゃおけないわ！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_03<tab>Vengeance is not the way!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_03<tab>わかりあえないからって、復讐しちゃいけないんだ！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_20<tab>What? The befouled aether refuses to disperse!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_20<tab>……な、何、これ？
<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2105901 /var>を倒しても、エーテルが霧散していかない？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_21<tab>What is dead can never die!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_21<tab>「不浄なるもの」に守られているかぎり、この子は不死身……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_22<tab>The power of healing, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Use it to purify the stagnant aether!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_22<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>、あの「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2105A01 /var>」を癒すの！
癒しの力で、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2105A01 /var>」を浄化しちゃうわよ！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_10<tab>Souls of the damned! Render your essence unto my creation!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_10<tab>ソウルレスよ、あの子に力を……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_11<tab>This bodes ill! Strike down the undead first!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_11<tab>あのソウルレスたちは……？
嫌な予感がします、先に奴らを倒しましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_32<tab>It...it rises! All that healing, and it still wasn't enough!?
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_32<tab>そんな、復活した！？
癒しの力を、あれだけ注ぎ込んだのに……！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_30<tab>It is no use! My pet cannot be slain!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_30<tab>無駄よ……この子は不死身なの……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_36<tab>No! We won't give up!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_36<tab>くっ……たとえ、復活しようとも！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_31<tab>If it rises again, we have but to strike it down!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_31<tab>不死身なんて、適当ぬかすんじゃないわよ！
蘇ったら、また倒せばいいの！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_34<tab>Matron have mercy... It's coming back!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_34<tab>そんな……<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2105901 /var>が復活しました！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_35<tab>We must focus on purifying it!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_35<tab>癒しの力が足りなかったのか……？
なら、次はもっと大きな癒しの力を注ぎ込めば！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_33<tab>Your feeble powers shan't avail you!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_33<tab>それっぽちの癒しで、この子を浄化できると思わないことね……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_37<tab>We mustn't give up! Keep purifying!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_37<tab>私たちの癒しが「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2105A01 /var>」を浄化しきるまで……。
何度だって、挑戦してやるわよ！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_40<tab>Confound it! The befouled aether still remains!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_40<tab>まただ……！　エーテルが霧散していかない！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_42<tab>How many times must I tell you? You struggle in vain!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_42<tab>言ったでしょう……？　この子は何度でも蘇る……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_41<tab>Hmph! We'll see about that!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_41<tab>ア・ルン、くじけるんじゃないの！
また、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2105A01 /var>」を癒して浄化するわよ！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_54<tab>Hah! 'Twas but a matter of time!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_54<tab>……どうよ、これだけ癒しの力を注ぎ込めば！！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_55<tab>Nooo! You will not get in the way of my vengeance!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_55<tab>……まだよ……まだ、終わらせない……！！
ずっと耐えてきたの……私は、世界に復讐するの……！！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_50<tab>It...it still returns!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ESCHIVA_BATTLETALK_50<tab>なお、復活するというのですか……！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_51<tab>Ah, but the befouled aether is gone! We nearly have it!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_51<tab>けど、「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2105A01 /var>」はもう感じない！
もう一押しだ……！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_56<tab>Souls of the damned! Come to our aid!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_56<tab>ソウルレスたち、あの子を守って……！！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_57<tab>More undead! Stay sharp!
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_57<tab>またソウルレスどもが……！　最後まで気を抜かずにいくわよ！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_52<tab>You know my suffering, yet you insist on standing in my way! Why!?
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_52<tab>どうして、あなたたちは、私をいじめるの……？
復讐の邪魔を……しないで……！！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_53<tab>Wake up, Alaqa! There is more to this than your own suffering!
target:
TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_53<tab>あんたが、やっちゃいけない事をしてるからよ！
でも……まだ、やり直すことも、できるはずだから！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_60<tab>No... I cannot fall now...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_BATTLETALK_60<tab>ここで、倒れるわけにはいかないのに……。

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_61<tab>I was not...strong enough...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ARUHNSENNA_BATTLETALK_61<tab>そんな……癒しの力が足りなかったの……？

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_62<tab>F-Forgive me...
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_ALAQA_BATTLETALK_62<tab>私が、守らなきゃいけないのに……！

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_124<tab>
target: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_124<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_JOBWHM600_01725_RAYAOSENNA_000_103<tab>
